segments.text: I see two children trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool that looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so high to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, looking up at him with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they think they can get away with this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just a few feet away, but she's completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the stool wobbling as the boy tries to balance himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they might be in trouble if the woman catches them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't hurt themselves trying to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how focused they are on getting those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
